On 11/22/05, Eugene Kuleshov <eu@...> wrote:
>
> Cedric,
>
> What coul=
d be value of repeated test alone?
>
> In JUnit 3 I'm using RepeatedTest to=
gether with ActiveTestSuite to
> perform rudimentary concurrency testing, b=
ut that is about it.


Stress/load testing mainly.

It's also useful with t=
he "partial failure" feature of TestNG:

@Test(invocationCount =3D 1000, su=
ccessPercentage =3D 98)
public void sendSms() {
}

This test will succeed i=
f at least 980 invocations pass.  This is convenient
when testing for unrel=
iable networks or robustness in the face of a randomly
simulated failure.

=
--
C=E9dric
